translations: n．祸害，灾难：对人类或社会造成极大痛苦和破坏的事物或现象。
· War and famine are scourges of humanity.
战争和饥荒是人类的祸害。
v．严惩，鞭打：对某人或某事施加严厉的惩罚或折磨。

sentences.sentence: War of aggression launched by fascists has brought scourges to mankind but also enlightened people throughout the world.
sentences.translation: 法西斯发动的侵略战争给人类带来了浩劫，也教育了世界人民。

sentences.sentence: Poverty and joblessness are the twin scourges of any society.
sentences.translation: 对于任何的一个社会来说，贫穷和失业都是两大社会问题。

sentences.sentence: One of the scourges of modern life may have been profoundly misunderstood.
sentences.translation: 现代生活中的一大祸害或许被深深地冤枉了。
